body.name: RANVOO 2024 Enhanced Powerful Instant Cooling [TOP1 All Day Cooling Portable Mini Travel Fan] Bladeless USB Desk Quiet Office Rechargeable Small Handheld Personal Hand Fan - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 17 mins
features: 🔋 [Stay Cooling Anytime and Anywhere] - Equipped with a high-density, energy-efficient polymer lithium battery, our fan can run for an impressive 21 hours continuously! No need for frequent recharges, allowing you to enjoy sustained coolness during outdoor activities or travels. Support for 2-hour fast charging and use while charging ensures you can quickly return to a refreshing world. Our promise is not just enduring coolness but also saving you from the hassle of constant charging.

❄️ [Powerful Cooling 1S Cool Down] - Don't underestimate our mini fan's compact size! It refuses to compromise on cooling power! With innovative dual-drive technology, it generates a cooling effect 150% stronger than similar-sized fans and can even blow away coins in a flash. Experience refreshing coolness everywhere you go, and feel the force of a mighty breeze.

👜 [Ultimate Portability, Minuscule Size]- We proudly announce that this is one of the smallest handheld fans on the market! Easily fit into your pocket or bag, making it a breeze to carry during travel, outdoor adventures, or at your office desk. 🌞🏕️ Stay cool anytime, anywhere, without burdening your journey or lifestyle.

🏆 [2023 Upgrade- Global Design Gold Award- A Must-Have for Each Summer!]- Proud winner of the 2023 Global Design Gold Award! Our handheld mini fan stands out with a unique and captivating design that has earned it global recognition. Every inch is meticulously crafted, exuding a striking fashion sense. More than just a fan, it's an artistic masterpiece that showcases your taste and individual style.

🌈[Brushless Silent & Ultimate Safe]Experience Unmatched Serenity and Peace of Mind. Indulge in the ultimate tranquility and comfort with our fan's brushless silent motor design and upgraded bladeless technology. Discover a world of serene bliss, as our fan's faster speed and innovative turbo blade design reduce noise by an impressive 25%. Say goodbye to distractions and embrace a productive work environment, caressed by a powerful yet whisper-quiet breeze, reaching you from up to 2 meters away.

🤝[Timeless Quality- Designed to Stay Your Satisfaction, Our Promise.] We take pride in delivering TOP1 high-quality products that stand the test of time. To ensure your peace of mind, we back our fan with an extended 365-day quality guarantee and offer dedicated customer service support that's available 24/7. Our commitment to your satisfaction means you can rest assured that any quality issues will be promptly resolved, allowing you to stay enjoy the unparalleled comfort of the fan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Mighty
reviews.reviewText: This gadget literally saved my life while at Disney World Florida last year. My family and I took our first trip to Disney in July. What a mistake going that time of the year. Temperatures hit 100 and felt almost 110 every day. If it wasn't for this incredible gadget I would have probably ruined our vacation. I shared it with the kids and it truly helped during that oppressive heat. The airflow is impressive. I originally wanted a more expensive fan but this one did wonders. I plan on purchasing more on our next trip. Worth the buy especially if you are not a fan of super hot weather. LIFE SAVER! One of my favorite purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about paying this much for a fan but it really is worth the cost. I wanted a fan that was stylish that I wouldn't mind wearing on my walks at work in and out of the building or on my walks with my dog at the apartment complex. I liked the look of this fan. I was happily surprised when I received it to find out it was very high quality. I live in Louisiana and it is unreasonably hot here. This fan doesn't solve the problem but it does help. Especially, as I overheat easily. It blows just enough air to keep me cooled down on a 15 minute walk. It has three speeds and the highest speed is really great. So far the battery life seems to be good, but I haven't had it that long. I definitely think this product is worth the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this mini fan
reviews.reviewText: This fan makes me very happy. The one thing I wish it had was a stand and a carry case. I love it so much that I would love it if there is another model that is bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful little unit
reviews.reviewText: 7/28/23 I plan to use it over my neck and hanging at my chest at a gym that has no air movement that I can feel. I wear noise cancelling earplugs that play my music and I doubt very much if the little bit of white noise this makes will be heard by me. The fan is very quiet on low power. Of course it gets louder when moving more air. But that's not to say it's ever loud. It's powerful enough to blow leaves from the driveway :-) . OK, that last was a lie, but for any normal personal fan use I can't see it not getting the job done.After it arrived I immediately plugged it in and it was fully charged in about an hour.It's small and light enough to be unobtrusive and unnoticeable. So far I just can't see it not doing what I want it to do.If anything else should need further reviewing either positive or negative I'll be back. So consider no news to be good news since so far I like the little unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a Monster of a little fan
reviews.reviewText: Now For how small this fan is, it is pretty awesome. I have had alit bigger fans move less air around than this little beast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT quiet even on low setting
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many small personal fans, trying to find something that is very quiet on the low setting so I can inobtrusively use it in quiet classical concert rooms, church, or at fine dining places. I had quiet little gentle fans 5 years ago, but the company stopped making them. All I have tried run at least 35 db. This one advertised it is <24 db on low, so despite the high price (3x what comparable fans cost), I ordered this. It is unfortunately not quiet , it was 35.8 db at 1 meter, we measured with a db app, which is audible not just to someone sitting near you, but across a 12 foot room -- i.e., just like others. On top of that, its cooling power was less than cheaper units sold on amazon. So I have returned it. For the price, it offers no benefit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just over priced but good product
reviews.reviewText: If it would’ve come with an app to alert you when the battery is low that would justify the price

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handheld mini fan
reviews.reviewText: Handheld Mini fan this is great for somebody that spends a lot of time outside it was so cool I have great for going to the beach or to the pool you can also use us at the park great battery life very light weight highly recommend in front of us looking for a very nice quality mini fan
